_header: I am a hart I am no hare
_description: Riddle of the hart and hare — four couplets

Bod851.Transcription:
I am a hert i am no areonys i fley i wel no mareit is i wrete in
                    my hodþat I am a swyere godI am an hare i am non hertonys
                    fley & let a sertȜe mow se by my hodmy hert is nowt my hed is
                    wod
